author: wszystkoconajwazniejsze.pl
title: Ground News - Russia uses cyberbullying and disinformation to destabilize the Balkans • Highlights
text:
Summary by wszystkoconajwazniejsze.pl Russia continues to play the role of destabilizer of the entire Balkans, using cyberbullying and disinformation in particular; NATO is closely watching the situation, General Pamela McGaha, commander of NATO headquarters in the capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina, said on Wednesday. The article Russia is using cyberbullying and disinformation to destabilize the Balkans comes from the Everything that matters most. Share menu More
